name: Dessert Alchemy ~ recipe ebook
description:
Dessert Alchemy ~ Raw Sweets to Inspire ~ is a recipe ebook, created to share the most delicious and healthy desserts with you! 

There are 33 pages of recipes and full-color images to help you make amazing raw pie, layer bars, chocolates and cookies, and elixirs. Superfoods and herbs are a unique addition to these desserts, using lucuma, maca, cacao, ashwagandha, reishi and more to boost energy, nutrition and flavor! 

Includes ~
Thin Mint Cookies
Pomegranate & Caramel Layer Bars
Cranberry Apple Layer Bars
Satsuma Coconut Cream Pie with Pomegranate Glaze
Apple Pie & Goji Berry Jam
Superfood Chocolate Truffles
Lemon Thyme Fudge
Berry Hibiscus Fudge
Persimmon Pecan Cobbler
Apple Raisin Cobbler & Vanilla Frosting
Spiced Almond Ice Cream Float
Cinnamon Mocha Elixir 

Perfect recipes for sharing at celebrations, during the holidays, and with family. Hope you enjoy!!!

**Simply purchase the book and you will receive a pdf copy of the book that can be printed out or used on-screen.

name: Turmeric Chai Bar ~ 3.5oz
description:
The latest addition to the heirloom chocolate cookie bar line ~ 

Turmeric Chai Bar! Filled with super nutrition, coconut, chai spices, anti-inflammatory turmeric and topped with raw heirloom Ecuadorian chocolate. 

Ingredients ~
Coconut Flakes*, Raw Almonds*, Heirloom Arriba Cacao*, Sundried Cane Juice Crystals*, Raw Honey, Virgin Coconut Oil*, Dates*, Lucuma*, Turmeric Extract, Ashwagandha Extract*. Cardamom*, Cloves*, Ginger*, Vanilla Bean, Himalayan Salt, Indonesian Cinnamon*, Nutmeg*.  *Organically Grown

name: I Heart Cacao ~ drinking chocolate - 6oz
description:
I Heart Cacao - heirloom raw cacao paste*, heirloom raw cacao powder*, sundried cane crystals*, lucuma*, maca*, cinnamon*, vanilla bean, camu camu*, stevia leaf*, Himalayan  salt.  *organically grown

Drinking chocolate, now in 6oz size, perfect for gifting and travel. This rich chocolate drink mix is designed to be used straight in warm water, if desired, or in your milk of choice. Warmed as a hot chocolate or used in elixirs and smoothies works great too!

6oz amber glass jar

name: Raw Chocolate Chips ~ Heirloom Ecuadorian - 8oz
description:
Raw chocolate chips - heirloom raw cacao*, sundried cane crystals*, vanilla bean. *organically grown

These fantastic little chips are made in Ecuador with heirloom raw cacao, and are perfect for making raw cookies or eating on their own, even baking if you like. Using heirloom, wild harvested cacao, all stone ground and processed at low temps, these chips are unlike any other raw chocolate product. 

8oz bag
Produced for us by Criollo Ecuador

name: Raw Chocolate Cake - recipe
description:
I am trying something new. I wanted to make this Raw Chocolate Cake recipe available like a downloadable song. You can purchase this Raw Chocolate Cake recipe in .PDF format for only 99 cents!

I love making raw desserts, which I'm sure you do too ;) The download includes a list of ingredients and tools needed, clear description of process and photos! This is my perfected recipe.

- raw chocolate cake 
- raw chocolate fudge filling/frosting 
- raw strawberry cream

All instructions are clear and easy to follow, and the ingredients are measured in grams so you can have ratios that will work every time!

Make this for a friend's birthday, blow the minds and tastebuds of a (rawfood) potluck, surprise your lover, or just treat yourself.

This recipe is available as a PDF, which you will receive as an email following payment direct to your inbox minutes after purchase. Thanks so much!

name: Nectar Bar - 3.5oz 6pack
description:
Enjoy this 6pack of Nectar Bars, each 3.5oz

Heirloom cacao & herbal coconut cookie, layered to perfection. 

A delicious layer bar, with a decadent medicinal Diviana Nectar infused cookie layer and a dense heirloom cacao layer on top.

Ingredients: organic coconut flakes, Arriba cacao paste, wild brazil nuts, raw honey, Diviana Nectar (raw honey, virgin coconut oil, mesquite, chlorella, shilajit, ashwaganda, mucuna, maca, reishi, tribulus, noni, he shou wu, vanilla bean, cinnamon, nutmeg, himalayan salt) sundried cane juice crystals, medjool dates, vanilla, Himalayan salt.

name: 6 Pack - Lucuma Cookie Bites
description:
Savor these little bites of coconut deliciousness and stock your fridge with some superfood treats! Tastes like shortbread, in the raw and completely free of gluten and refined sugars. 

6 x 3.5oz Bags - Lucuma Cookie Bites

Ingredients - Organic Coconut Flakes, Wild Brazil Nuts, Raw Unfiltered Wildflower Honey, Organic Lucuma Powder, Organic Maca Powder, Vanilla Bean Powder, Organic Indonesian Cinnamon, Organic Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt.

name: 4 Pack - Heirloom Cacao + Cookie Bars
description:
Try all four of the Heirloom Cacao + Superfood Cookie Bars! 

Two layer bars, one layer is a raw coconut based superfood cookie - each with unique superfoods and herbs, the other is an Ecuadorian heirloom cacao layer sweetened with organic cane juice crystals. 

Includes : Nectar Bar 3.5oz, Lucuma Bar 3.5oz, Spirulina Bar 3.5oz, Jungle Bar 3.5oz

Ingredients:
Nectar Bar - Heirloom Cacao Paste, Coconut Flakes, Brazil Nuts, Raw Honey, Cane Juice Crystals, Diviana Nectar (Raw Honey, Coconut Oil, Mesquite, Maca, Shilajit, Ashwagandha, Mucuna, Chlorella, He Shou Wu, Reishi, Cinnamon, Vanilla Bean, Cordyceps, Tribulus, Noni, Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt), Dates, Cinnamon, Himalayan Salt.

Lucuma Bar - Heirloom Cacao Paste, Coconut Flakes, Brazil Nuts, Raw Honey, Cane Juice Crystals, Lucuma, Dates, Maca, Coconut Oil, Cinnamon, Vanilla Bean, Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt.

Spirulina Bar - Heirloom Cacao Paste, Coconut Flakes, Coconut Flour, Raw Honey, Cane Juice Crystals, Banana Flakes, Dates, Hemp Protein, Incan Spirulina, Chlorella, Coconut Oil, Cinnamon, Vanilla Bean, Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt.

Jungle Bar - Heirloom Cacao Paste, Coconut Flakes, Lightly Roasted Jungle Peanuts, Raw Honey, Cane Juice Crystals, Banana Flakes, Dates, Lucuma, Maca, Cinnamon, Vanilla Bean, Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt.

name: The Raw Cookie Book
description:
- a collection of over 40 cookie recipes
- superfood ingredient descriptions
- unique techniques for raw cookie making
- beautiful photography by Julia Corbett

written by - Julia Corbett


The Raw Cookie Book contains over 40 original raw cookie recipes, using healthy ingredients that are all gluten-free. Superfoods and medicinal herbs are infused into the cookies to create the most nutrient-dense treats with amazing flavor.

Julia Corbett supplies tips and techniques to make the most heavenly sweet treats you have ever eaten. She offers a conscious way to choose ingredients and delivers beauty in her sweets.

Cookie recipes like Chocolate Chip Cookies, Maple Walnut Shortbread and Wild Berry Jam Linzer Cookies are all filled with raw ingredients and it could be argued that they taste more delectable than their cooked counterparts. Try these and many more healthy and sustainable cookie recipes, deliciousness is waiting.

*Leave me a note if you would like it signed, and whom to :)
Shipped USPS Priority mail.

Book size: 7"x7" 120 pages. Full color, printed on 100% post consumer recycled paper with water based veg inks.

name: Sweet & Raw Pie Mandalas - Book
description:
SWEET & RAW PIE MANDALAS by Julia Corbett

Delightful and delicious recipes for healthful and nutritious dessert food.  These recipes will inspire the creative artist within, to share  with others the beautiful and tasty treats that all can enjoy.  This book is gluten-free with a focus on raw foods, and uses the most nutrient dense ingredients available to us today.  Highlighting the use of fresh, local and seasonal foods, Sweet & Raw Pie Mandalas loves to support quality farmers and ensure the vision of a sustainable future.   EAT FRESH, in LOVE. 

"Not only is each of Julia's mandala pies truly a piece of edible art to be enjoyed with your eyes, tongue and the rest of your being, the vibrance of their live super food ingredients make them fuel for your own creative fire. Appreciate these delectable desserts as you would a fine wine: savoring the texture, taste, mouth feel, color and aroma of every bite! Thank you Julia for making the most beautiful, best-tasting, healthiest treats ever!" ~Bruce Horowitz author of The Sun Kitchen Un-cookbook www.thesunkitchen.com

<object width="300" height="169"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/kMOBf95UjkU?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/kMOBf95UjkU?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="300" height="169"></embed></object>

Sweet & Raw Pie Mandalas - Book, Recycled Paper and Veg Inks (166 pages - Over 60 Original Recipes)

name: Diviana Nectar 4.7oz
description:
Amazing medicinal Raw Honey blend of Ayurvedic herbs, tonic mushrooms, superfoods,virgin coconut oil and synergizing spices.

Completely Organic and/or Wildcrafted

Ingredients:  Raw Unfiltered Honey, Virgin Coconut Oil, Ashwaganda, Chlorella, Mesquite, Mucuna, Shilajit, Vanilla, Cordyceps, Ho Shu Wu, Maca, Noni, Red Reishi, Tribulus, Himalayan Crystal Salt, and Spices.

:Adaptogenic
:Immune enhancing
:Longevity promoting
:Energizing
:Mineralizing
:Cell rejuvenator
:Antioxidant rich
:Metabolic regulating
:Hormone normalizer
:Great tasting Energy Elixer

Diviana Nectar contains magical components to energize and actualize your being with truly RAW honey, the most amazing coconut oil ever, super adaptogenic herbs, and superfoods. 

In Ayurveda, honey and sugar are commonly added to certain herbal formulations to act as an anupan, a substance that directs the properties of the herbs deep into the tissues, which helps to better facilitate active ingredients into cell walls.

Best eaten by the spoonful for an energy boost, daily tonic, or meal replacement and makes a perfect medicine food while traveling. Can as well be added to smoothies or dessert recipes. Anywhere you can add honey you can add Diviana Nectar.

Daily recommended: 1tsp - 2tbsp

Diviana Nectar, Organic and/or Wildcrafted, 4.7oz (in glass jar)

name: Diviana Chocolate 5oz
description:
A blend of organic heirloom Ecuadorian cacao paste, raw unfiltered honey, organic virgin coconut oil, organic maca, shilajit (extract), organic ashwagandha (extract), organic mucuna (extract), resihi (extract), organic camu camu, tumeric (extract), piperine black pepper (extract), wild vanilla bean, organic cinnamon, organic nutmeg, himalayan salt.

Yummy, tastes like a chocolate caramel sauce, completely Raw, full of nutrition.  The heirloom cacao in this Nectar helps to drive the other components into the system and acts as a poteniator for the herbs...increasing their strength and the energy they provide.  

Can be eaten by the spoonful on its own, added to smoothies, or added to dessert recipes for more depth and dimension. 

Daily recommended: 2tsp - 2tbsp

Diviana Chocolate, Organic and/or Wildcrafted, 5oz (in glass jar)

name: Diviana Chocolate 13oz
description:
A blend of Unfiltered Raw Honey, 100% Arriba Nacional Cacao Paste, Yacon Root Powder, Mesquite Pod Meal, Ashwaganda, Mucuna, Red Reishi Extract, Shilajit, Vanilla Powder, and Himalayan Salt.

Yummy, tastes like a chocolate caramel sauce, completely Raw, full of nutrition. The heirloom cacao in this Nectar helps to drive the other components into the system and acts as a poteniator for the herbs...increasing their strength and the energy they provide.

Can be eaten by the spoonful on its own, added to smoothies, or added to dessert recipes for more depth and dimension.

Daily recommended: 2tsp - 2tbsp

Diviana Chocolate, Organic and/or Wildcrafted, 13oz (in glass jar)

name: Raw Heirloom Cacao Spiced Truffle Butter - 6oz jar
description:
This is a LIMITED EDITION product!

Using raw heirloom cacao paste (cacao beans that have been stone ground) a smooth and creamy truffle butter is created. This is a delicious gift for the holidays, and is made with all organic ingredients and comes in a recycled glass corked jar.

Ingredients : raw heirloom cacao paste, sundried cane juice crystals, virgin coconut oil, vanilla bean, cardamom, cinnamon, nutmeg, reishi extract, chaga extract, lions mane extract, himalayan salt.

*To warm as a sauce, just place glass container into a pot of water over very low heat, and melt.
6oz glass jar

name: Raw Heirloom Cacao Mint Truffle Butter - 6oz jar
description:
This is a LIMITED EDITION product!

Using raw heirloom cacao paste (cacao beans that are stone ground), this truffle butter is mixed with organic peppermint essential oil to create a super smooth and creamy chocolate spread.

Ingredients : heirloom cacao paste, sundried cane juice crystals, virgin coconut oil, green coffee bean extract, shilajit, lions mane extract, vanilla bean, peppermint essential oil, himalayan salt.

*To create a chocolate sauce, just place jar into a pot of water on low heat until contents are melted. Great over ice cream or pie!

6oz glass jar

name: Nectar Gift Bag
description:
Here are the signature products from Diviana Alchemy all in one fabulous gift pack.  I have included:

Diviana Nectar 4.7oz
Diviana Chocolate 5oz

3" wooden spoon with heart or stars

All packaged with Love.

You pay: $42.80
MSRP: $47.40

name: Lucuma Cookie Bites 3.5oz
description:
Raw & Gluten-Free treats with full-on yum flavors and impeccable ingredient sourcing. A healthy cookie bite that tastes as good as it is good for you. There is true pleasure in these.

Handmade with Lots of Love!

Ingredients: Organic Coconut Flakes, Organic Lucuma Powder, Wild Brazil Nuts, Raw Honey, Organic Maca Powder, Vanilla Bean, Organic Lemon Zest, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Himalayan Salt

Lucuma Cookie Bites, Organic and/or Wildcrafted, 3.5oz

name: Lucuma Bar - 3.5oz
description:
The Lucuma Cookie Bites have a new friend - the Lucuma Bar!

Made with a lucuma cookie base and layered with dark heirloom chocolate, this bar is a decadent treat! Made using the same process as the popular 'Nectar Bar'

Ingredients - Heirloom cacao paste, organic coconut flakes, raw unfiltered honey, organic sundried cane juice crystals, wild brazil nuts, organic virgin coconut oil, organic lucuma powder, organic maca powder, wild vanilla bean powder, organic cinnamon, organic nutmeg, himalayan salt.

name: Incan Spirulina Protien Bites - 3.5oz
description:
Superfood infused cookie bites, with the added benefit of hemp protein, Incan Spirulina, and chlorella. 

3.5oz bag

Ingredients: organic coconut flakes, raw organic coconut flour, raw honey, hemp protein, heirloom banana flakes, organic dates, Incan spirulina, chlorella, cinnamon, sea salt.

name: Spirulina Bar - 3.5oz
description:
Incan Spirulina Cookie Bites recipe is used as the base for this bar, layered with dark heirloom chocolate. Delicious, filled with green plant protein and heirloom banana flakes! A great post-workout food, energizing and satisfying with a nut-free recipe!

Ingredients - Heirloom cacao paste, organic coconut flakes, organic coconut flour, raw unfiltered honey, organic sundried cane juice crystals, organic dates, heirloom banana flakes, organic coconut oil, hemp protein powder, incan spirulina, chlorella, wild vanilla bean, organic cinnamon, himalayan salt.

name: Cherry Lucuma Bar 2.5oz
description:
Made with dried bing cherries, lucuma powder and hibiscus flower powder, these bars are incredibly tasty with a fruity zing.  These bars are satisfying and great for travel or outdoor adventures!

Ingredients:
Coconut flakes, Brazil nuts, dried cherries, lucuma powder, raw honey, dates, maca powder, vanilla bean, cinnamon, nutmeg, hibiscus powder, Himalayan salt.

2.5oz bar in biodegradable cellophane wrap

name: Banana Goji Bar - 2.5oz
description:
Banana Goji Bar - 2.5oz

Ingredients: organic coconut flakes, wild brazil nuts, raw honey, medjool dates, heirloom banana flakes, goji berries, lucuma, maca, camu camu, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, himalayan salt.

name: Nectar Bar - 3.5oz
description:
Nectar Bar - 3.5oz

A delicious layer bar, with a decadent medicinal Diviana Nectar infused cookie layer and a dense heirloom cacao layer on top.

Ingredients: organic coconut flakes, Arriba cacao paste, wild brazil nuts, raw honey, Diviana Nectar (raw honey, virgin coconut oil, mesquite, chlorella, shilajit, ashwaganda, mucuna, maca, reishi, tribulus, noni, he shou wu, vanilla bean, cinnamon, nutmeg, himalayan salt) sundried cane juice crystals, medjool dates, vanilla, Himalayan salt.

name: Jungle Bar - 3.5oz
description:
Delicious candy bar, healthy style! A layer of Jungle Peanut butter shortbread cookie underneath a decadent heirloom chocolate layer. Full of superfoods and full of flavor! 

Ingredients:
Coconut Flakes, Lightly Roasted Jungle Peanuts, Heirloom Arriba Cacao, Cane Juice Crystals, Raw Honey,Heirloom Banana Flakes, Dates, Lucuma,Coconut Oil,  Maca, Vanilla Bean, Himalayan Salt, Cinnamon, Nutmeg.

name: Incan Spirulina 6oz
description:
incan spirulina is grown high in Andes mountains of Ecuador and is glacier water fed. this spirulina has a delicious flavor like no other, fully rich and creamy. spirulina is a single-celled, blue-green algae and is rich in protein, chlorophyll and phytonutrients.

mix 1 tsp-2 T in smoothies, salads, cooked grains or raw chocolate treats.

ingredient - incan spirulina powder

6oz glass jar

name: Green Coffee Bean Extract - 2oz
description:
green coffee bean is the raw seed inside the fruit of the coffee plant. ingredient - unroasted and cold-water extracted, shade grown 
organic coffee arabica.

suggested use : 1/2 tsp - 1 tsp
blend into smoothies, elixirs, teas, chocolate.

2oz glass jar

name: Cacao Paste - 8oz
description:
Arriba Cacao Paste from the most delicious & flavorful heirloom cacao beans available, heirloom cacao pods are hand harvested in Ecuador and processed to ensure a product that is clean and unlike any other.  

This cacao is sundried and lightly fermented to bring out the true chocolate flavors that we have come to love.  Then it is stoneground in to a liquor where it then solidifies at room temperature as thin sheets to create easy to work with pieces of cacao paste.

Cacao Paste, Organic, Stone-ground, Raw - 8oz

name: Cacao Beans, unpeeled 8oz
description:
These heirloom beans from Ecuador are delicious and full of minerals.  

The cacao bean is a great source of magnesium, antioxidants, and numerous alkaloids that potentiate chemical reactions in the body through neurotransmitters and bliss loving synapses like anandamide and theobromine.

These are the seed of the cacao fruit, fermented and dried.  This is whole cacao at it’s finest. Heirloom and wild varieties are the most beneficial in medicinal properties and bioavailable nutrients.

Cacao Beans, Organic, Sun Dried, 8oz

name: Moonspoon - Heart
description:
Hand carved from cherry wood spoon that is perfect for Diviana Nectar, herbs and superfoods, or serving anything delicate and delicious.

These cherry wood spoons are lazer cut with a heart shape, each spoon is unique and beautiful. Also very strong, and can be used in many applications. 

Moonspoon - Heart, 6"

name: Moonspoon - Celestial
description:
Hand carved from cherry wood spoon that is perfect for Diviana Nectar or serving anything little and delicious.

Moonspoon - Moon, 6"
